title: Glymed Plus Age Management Derma Pigment Skin Brightener, 2oz
description: What is It? A revolutionary, hydroquinone-free formulation for powerful skin brightening and conditioning results in 30 days. What is it used for? GLYMED PLUS Derma Pigment Skin Brightener derive from natural amino acid to brighten and condition skin in 30 days. Hydroquinone-free formulation and as effective as Kojic Acid. This is more effective with extended use. Sun spots, pigmentation and dark age marks starts to fade. As a result, brighter, lighter and clearer ageless skin appears. How is it used? Apply 2-4 drops onto clean skin morning and evening. Gently massage until completely absorbed. Follow with Glymed Plus sunscreen. Ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Glycolic Acid, Kojic Acid, Citric Acid, Phytic Acid, Panthenol, Aloe Barbondensis leaf Juice, Ascorbic Acid, Dipotassium Azelate, Bisabolol, Beta Carotene, Tocopherol (Vitamin E), Ethylhexyl Methoxycinnamate, Camellia Sinensis Leaf (Green Tea) Oil, Polysorbate 20, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Propylene Glycol, Methylparaben, Imidazolindinyl Urea, Sodium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA.

title: Lightweight & helps even your skin tone
